sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react' import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom'; export default function BlogPage() { const { id } = useParams(); const [blog, Setblogs] = useState([]); useEffect(() => { document.title = `ForendonBlog | ${categoryName ? categoryName : "Ana Sayfa"}`; const fetchAllblogs = async () => { try { const getblogs = await axios.get("http://localhost:7007/api/posts"); const blogsdata = getblogs.data; const filteredBlogs = blogsdata.filter(blog => blog.id === id); Setblogs(filteredBlogs); } catch (error) { console.error("Veriler çekilirken bir hata oluştu:", error); } }; fetchAllblogs(); }, [categoryName]); return (

{blog?.cate?.toUpperCase()}

{blog.title}

Yazar: {blog.username}

{formatDate(blog.date)}

{blog.desc}...

Previous Next

97 sonuçtan 1 ile 10 {' '} arası gösteriliyor

Previous 1 2 3 ... 8 9 10 Next
) }
